longBusinessSummary: NDR Auto Components Limited engages in manufacturing, fabricating, assembling, selling, and trading of automotive components for passenger cars and utility vehicles primarily in India. The company provides seat frames and seat trims for two-wheeler and four-wheeler vehicles, as well as offers body in white parts; and spare parts and components for seats. NDR Auto Components Limited was founded in 1930 and is based in Gurugram, India.
